body:
Any girl who I have told that I was a virgin (only a few when I was younger and dumber) have been incredibly turned off by it, to the point of just ghosting me then and there when hearing it. Even when I was like 18-19 they thought something must be incredibly wrong with me to be a virgin at that age. 

 I keep hearing about these women who are looking to take virginities... but only ever online. When women are asked IRL, in filmed social surveys, or surveys in general virginity is a giant turnoff. Yeah I could just not tell them ( I don't tell anyone anymore) but the advice to tell them is just wrong, flat out. 

I appreciate that you are trying to help man. Your advice seems genuine enough I guess. I've done plenty of reading and you could give me all of the advice in the world but I don't think it will help much. Just like when I first started boxing, or wrestling or judo. Even as a pretty athletic guy, you always start out pretty spazzy and embarrassing, like a newborn deer trying to walk. If I was 16 that would be as expected, but at 24 a woman would just say you are shit in bed and then would tell your entire social circle and then you are starting from square one again. 

Building any social circle for me or ever getting a woman to bed is a massively unlikely, almost herculean task to begin with. I guess I'm just bitching at this point. Maybe I should practice with a hooker then, I don't know. I just know that even **with** practice I would probably still be too anxious with a girl I like to do anything well. I mean outside of porn I have no clue. Does sex even work when you don't have an 11'' dick? I wouldn't really know.
